text: Song Jae-ho (born Song Jae-eon; March 10, 1937 â€“ November 7, 2020) was a South Korean actor. He made his acting debut in 1959. He was best known for his role in Yeong-ja's Heydays (1975). He also starred in Memories of Murder (2003), The President's Last Bang (2005) and Late Blossom (2011), as well as the television drama Precious Family (2004). Song died on November 7, 2020 at the age of 83.Veteran actor Song Jae-ho dies ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:South Korean actors
title: Song Jae-ho
